sqlMap.select: SELECT newsID, newsTitle, entryDate, entryuser, newsStatusID, newsStatusName FROM (SELECT ROWNUM rn, t.* FROM ( SELECT a.news_id newsID, a.News_Title newsTitle, TO_CHAR (a.entry_date, 'yyyy/MM/dd') entryDate, a.entry_user entryuser, a.News_Status newsStatusID, b.info_name newsStatusName FROM Traffic_Text_News_Info_T a JOIN Traffic_Base_Info_T b ON a.News_Status = b.Info_ID AND b.is_del = '0' AND a.is_del = '0' WHERE a.News_Part_Tag = '1' AND A.NEWS_STATUS = '7' AND a.Program_Type = #leaderId# ORDER BY a.entry_date DESC) t WHERE ROWNUM <= #rEnd#) WHERE rn >= #rStart#

SELECT count(*) FROM Traffic_Text_News_Info_T a JOIN Traffic_Base_Info_T b ON a.News_Status = b.Info_ID AND b.is_del = '0' AND a.is_del = '0' WHERE a.News_Part_Tag = '1' AND a.Program_Type = #leaderId#

SELECT t.LEADER_ID AS leaderId, t.leader_name AS leaderName, REPLACE (t.leader_post, ',', '„ÄÅ') AS leaderPost, t.leader_photos_url AS leaderPhotosUrl, t.leader_resume AS leaderResume FROM TRAFFIC_LEADER_INFO_T t WHERE t.status = 7 AND T.IS_DEL = '0' ORDER BY LEADER_ORDER

select t.LEADER_ID as leaderId, t.leader_name as leaderName, t.leader_post as leaderPost, t.leader_photos_url as leaderPhotosUrl, t.leader_resume as leaderResume from TRAFFIC_LEADER_INFO_T t where t.status='7' and t.LEADER_ID=#leaderId#
